message: Fixes misnamed title in Redeemable; Updates Redeemable to be named RedeemableToken  for greater clarity
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Adds redeeming tests (omitted in last commit)
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Makes redeem functionality only callable by account holder; restricts redeem call access to "certified depositors" (initially large buyers); Adds ability to add / remove certified depositors with "depositCertifier" account; adds tests for redeeming and updating certified depositors list
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Adds check for totalSupply for redeem test
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Makes FiatToken pausable; adds tests for pausable fiat token; renames files used by FiatToken for clarity.
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Makes redeem function pausable with pauser role. Adds tests for paused redeem function
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Makes FiatToken redeemable by "redeemer" role. Adds redeem tests
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Adds index to _from, _to in Fee event
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Adds "upgrader" role to FiatToken with Upgradable contract. Adds Tests "upgrader" role.
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Adds "minter" role to FiatToken; Requires "minter" to mint finishMinting
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Switches transferFrom to deduct transferAmount from allowed instead of totalAmount; removes defunct approve/increaseApproval/DecreaseApproval with fee functions; adds tests for consistency between transfer(x) and approve(x) + transferFrom(x); removes tests for defunct with approve/increaseApproval/decreaseApproval with fee functions
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Consolidates calculateFee function with prepareFee function; adds Fee event; adds comments where sparse; adds wrapper functions for approval, increaseApproval, decreaseApproval to include fees.
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Refactors common transfer code in FiatToken
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Updates FiatToken contract to include transfer fees; updates FiatToken tests to test transfer fees
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Adds contract and method comments to CentreTokenRegistry
author: Oliver Hudson

message: Adds OpenZeppelin library as submodule fixed to v1.6.0; Adds FiatToken; Adds FiatToken tests; Adds TokenRegistry; Adds README
author: Oliver Hudson
